General.Name: Zhejiang Supor Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Supor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells cookware and kitchen utensils, small and large electric kitchen appliances, and home environmental appliances in China and internationally. The company offers open fire cookware and kitchen utensils, including woks, pressure cookers, fry pans, ceramic slow cookers, steamer and ceramic pots, sauce pans, steamers, kettles, knives, spatulas, thermal pots, thermos and flasks, kitchen gadgets, crispers, etc.; and small domestic appliances, such as electric rice cookers, electric pressure cookers, induction hobs, soymilk makers, electric kettles, juicers, slow cookers, electric steamers, electric hotpots, food processors, baked machines, air fryers, etc. It also provides large kitchen appliances comprising range hoods, gas stoves, disinfection cabinets, water purifiers, embedded steaming ovens, water heaters, integrated stoves, etc.; and air purifiers, garment steamers, vacuum cleaners, floor washers, air filters, and electric irons. The company's cookware and electrical products are primarily exported to approximately 50 countries and regions, including Japan, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Ji De  Ye
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
